mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.BRAND as brand, a.VIN as vin, a.MODEL as model, a.ENGINE_NUM as engineNum, a.VEHICLE_RECEIPT_AMOUNT as vehicleReceiptAmount, a.SALES_STATUS as salesStatus, a.STATUS as status, a.STATUS_THREE as statusThree, b.MILEAGE as mileage, b.FIRST_REGIST_DATE as firstRegistDate, b.BUYER_NAME as firstParty, b.SELLER_NAME as secondParty, d.url as url, a.CREATE_TIME as createTime
mapper.select: select uci.id, uci.BRAND, uci.YEAR, uci.MODEL, ucid.MILEAGE, uci.VIN, uci.CREATE_TIME as createTime, ucid.CERTIFICATE_NO as certificateNo, ucid.DRIVING_lICENSE as drivingLicense, uci.SALES_STATUS as salesStatus, uci.CHECK_STATUS as checkStatus, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), uci.CREATE_TIME) inStockTime, ucid.pay_type as payType, ucid.remit_type as remitType, ucid.FIRST_REGIST_DATE as firsRegistration, ucid.FIRST_REGIST_DATE as firstRegistDate, uci.CREATOR as operator, ENGINE_NUM as engineNum, SELLER_ID_CARD as sellerIdCard, SELLER_NAME as sellerName, SELLER_TEL as sellerTel, collection, THIRD_SELLER_NAME as thirdSellerName, REMIT_TYPE as remitType, THIRD_BANK_CARD as thirdBankCard, BUYER_ID_CARD as buyerIdCard, BUYER_NAME as buyerName, BUYER_TEL buyerTel from uctp_car_info uci left join uctp_car_info_details ucid on uci.ID =ucid.CAR_ID where uci.id=#{id}

select SELLER_ID_CARD as sellerIdCard, SELLER_NAME as sellerName, SELLER_TEL as sellerTel, collection, THIRD_SELLER_NAME as thirdSellerName, REMIT_TYPE as remitType, THIRD_BANK_CARD as thirdBankCard, BUYER_ID_CARD as buyerIdCard, BUYER_NAME as buyerName, BUYER_TEL buyerTel from uctp_car_info_details where CAR_ID =#{carID}

select
ucid.FIRST_REGIST_DATE as firstRegistDate,
ENGINE_NUM as engineNum from uctp_car_info_details ucid
where ucid.CAR_ID=#{id}

select DRIVING_lICENSE as drivingLicense, CERTIFICATE_NO as certificateNo
from uctp_car_info_details where CAR_ID =#{carID}

select ubf.id as longId from uctp_car_info_details ucid inner join uctp_business_file ubf on ucid.CAR_ID =ubf.MAIN_ID
where CAR_ID =#{carID}

select ubf.id as longId from uctp_car_info_details ucid inner join uctp_business_file ubf on ucid.DRIVING_lICENSE =ubf.MAIN_ID
where CAR_ID =#{carID}
select ubf.id as longId from uctp_car_info_details ucid inner join uctp_business_file ubf on ucid.CERTIFICATE_NO =ubf.MAIN_ID where CAR_ID =#{carID}
